name: Accumulated Knowledge
oracle_text: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Accumulated Knowledge in all graveyards.
flavor_text:
"I have seen and heard much here. There are secrets within secrets. Let me show you."
—Takara, to Eladamri

name: Act of Heroism
oracle_text: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 until end of turn and can block an additional creature this turn.
flavor_text:
"On every plane, there are those who run toward danger."
—Gideon Jura

name: Act of Treason
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavor_text:
"Rage courses in every heart, yearning to betray its rational prison."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Ainok Survivalist
oracle_text:
Megamorph {1}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Ainok Survivalist is turned face up, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.

name: Ambassador Oak
oracle_text: When Ambassador Oak enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
flavor_text: Treefolk and elves share a common interest in the forests, but really the elves just feel at home with the view from above.

name: Arbor Elf
oracle_text: {T}: Untap target Forest.

name: Arcane Denial
oracle_text:
Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Assembly-Worker
oracle_text: {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: With their factories long destroyed, some of Mishra's creations still toil in remote areas, endlessly performing and reperforming their last orders.

name: Auramancer
oracle_text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."

name: Balduvian Horde
oracle_text: When Balduvian Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.
flavor_text:
"We earn no medals and fight for no titles. Blood is proof of our victory."
—Lovisa Coldeyes

name: Bloodhunter Bat
oracle_text:
Flying
When Bloodhunter Bat enters the battlefield, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: It returns eager to share the feast of blood and gore with its ghoulish master.

name: Borrowing 100,000 Arrows
oracle_text: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.
flavor_text: Kongming and Lu Su tricked Wei troops into shooting over 100,000 arrows at them to later use against the Wei at Red Cliffs.

name: Brainstorm
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

name: Chandra's Outrage
oracle_text: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor_text: Chandra never believed in using her "inside voice."

name: Chartooth Cougar
oracle_text:
{R}: Chartooth Cougar gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Choking Tethers
oracle_text:
Tap up to four target creatures.
Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Choking Tethers, you may tap target creature.

name: Cinder Storm
oracle_text: Cinder Storm deals 7 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Any pyromancer can summon fire with a thought. The trick is putting it out.

name: Cloudshift
oracle_text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text:
"Even storm clouds bow to worship Avacyn."
—Elder Rimheit

name: Colossal Dreadmaw
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text: If you feel the ground quake, run. If you hear its bellow, flee. If you see its teeth, it's too late.

name: Coralhelm Guide
oracle_text: {4}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text:
"She knows every step of this coastline, both above and below the surface, and she has hideouts all along the way. She will get you there."
—Jori En, expedition leader

name: Counterspell
oracle_text: Counter target spell.

name: Court Hussar
oracle_text:
Vigilance
When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {W} was spent to cast it.

name: Crimson Mage
oracle_text: {R}: Target creature you control gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavor_text:
"We wield the fires of rage. War is our blood and destruction our birthright."
—Crimson creed

name: Cultivate
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

name: Dark Ritual
oracle_text: Add {B}{B}{B}.

name: Dauntless Cathar
oracle_text: {1}{W}, Exile Dauntless Cathar from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: "The harder they try to extinguish my faith, the brighter it burns in the darkness."

name: Death's-Head Buzzard
oracle_text:
Flying
When Death's-Head Buzzard dies, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Infested with vermin, ever hungering, dropping from night's sky.

name: Diabolic Edict
oracle_text: Target player sacrifices a creature.

name: Dirge of Dread
oracle_text:
All creatures gain fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Cycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Dirge of Dread, you may have target creature gain fear until end of turn.

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"The tools of evil are mere things. And like all things, they cannot last forever."
—*Song of All*, canto 881

name: Disfigure
oracle_text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Brave scar or unfortunate tale? It all depends on your pain threshold."

name: Dragon's Eye Savants
oracle_text:
Morph—Reveal a blue card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Dragon's Eye Savants is turned face up, look at target opponent's hand.

name: Dusk Legion Zealot
oracle_text: When Dusk Legion Zealot enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text: Once they reached Orazca, the Legion's explorers ransacked tombs and temples, hunting for the Immortal Sun.

name: Echoing Courage
oracle_text: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A single seed unleashes a flurry of growth.

name: Elvish Aberration
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {G}{G}{G}.
Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Ember Weaver
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
As long as you control a red permanent, Ember Weaver gets +1/+0 and has first strike.
flavor_text:
"Each night, the sun unravels and blows away. Each day, the spiders set a new one in the sky."
—Sunseeder myth

name: Epic Confrontation
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text: No matter the timeline, some legends will endure.

name: Erg Raiders
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if Erg Raiders didn't attack this turn, Erg Raiders deals 2 damage to you unless it came under your control this turn.
flavor_text: Their skills are extensive, and their appetite for battle just as vast.

name: Fathom Seer
oracle_text:
Morph—Return two Islands you control to their owner's hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Fathom Seer is turned face up, draw two cards.

name: Fencing Ace
oracle_text: Double strike
flavor_text: His prowess gives the guildless hope that they can hold out against tyranny.

name: Frenzied Goblin
oracle_text: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text: The upside to not thinking about the consequences is that you'll always surprise those who do.

name: Geist of the Moors
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"The battle is won. There's work to be done. / The Blessed Sleep must wait. / A fiend is about. It stalks the devout. / I'll save them from my fate."
—"The Good Geist's Vow"

name: Ghost Ship
oracle_text:
Flying
{U}{U}{U}: Regenerate Ghost Ship.
flavor_text: Going down with the ship is just the beginning.

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Only the most effective tactics stand the test of time."
—Gamelen, Citanul elder

name: Gods Willing
oracle_text:
Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.)
Scry 1.
flavor_text: Honor the gods of Theros, and they will return the favor.

name: Griffin Protector
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Griffin Protector gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The drums of war stir the hearts of all who fight for righteousness.

name: Haunted Fengraf
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Haunted Fengraf: Return a creature card at random from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: A ghoulcaller's playground.

name: Hordeling Outburst
oracle_text: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor_text:
"Leave no scraps, lest you attract pests."
—Mardu threat

name: Horror of the Broken Lands
oracle_text:
Whenever you cycle or discard another card, Horror of the Broken Lands gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: It feeds on dry bones in the sand and desperate pleas in the wind.

name: Horseshoe Crab
oracle_text: {U}: Untap Horseshoe Crab.
flavor_text: In the final days before the disaster, all the crabs on Tolaria migrated from inlets, streams, and ponds back to the sea. No one took note.

name: Jackal Pup
oracle_text: Whenever Jackal Pup is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.
flavor_text: The first morning after acquiring her familiar, the wizard awoke with fleabites and mange.

name: Kavu Climber
oracle_text: When Kavu Climber enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text:
The kavu might be above you
—Llanowar expression meaning "keep an open mind"

name: Kindle
oracle_text: Kindle deals X damage to any target, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Kindle in all graveyards.
flavor_text: Hope of deliverance is scorched by the fire of futility.

name: Knight of the Skyward Eye
oracle_text: {3}{G}: Knight of the Skyward Eye gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: The Order of the Skyward Eye does the bidding of an evil force, unwittingly stirring fear and mistrust across Bant in accordance with his plans.

name: Loyal Sentry
oracle_text: When Loyal Sentry blocks a creature, destroy that creature and Loyal Sentry.
flavor_text: His watch ends only when he does.

name: Lull
oracle_text:
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: The clamor of war ceased as both armies stood and marveled at the beauty of Gaea's work.

name: Lunarch Mantle
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{1}, Sacrifice a permanent: This creature gains flying until end of turn."
flavor_text:
"A boon from the angels should never be cast aside."
—Manfried Ulmach, Chief Inquisitor

name: Man-o'-War
oracle_text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch."
—Naimah, Femeref philosopher

name: Mogg Flunkies
oracle_text: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.
flavor_text: They'll attack whatever's in front of them—as long as you tell them where that is.

name: Murder
oracle_text: Destroy target creature.
flavor_text:
"No matter how busy my schedule gets, I always try to take time for that personal touch."
—Queen Marchesa

name: Mystic of the Hidden Way
oracle_text:
Mystic of the Hidden Way can't be blocked.
Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor_text: "There are no obstacles, only different paths."

name: Nettle Sentinel
oracle_text:
Nettle Sentinel doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever you cast a green spell, you may untap Nettle Sentinel.
flavor_text: Though Shadowmoor's monster-haunted wilds beckon, she never leaves her post.

name: Nezumi Cutthroat
oracle_text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Nezumi Cutthroat can't block.
flavor_text:
"The nezumi will do things for money no other thinking creature would consider. This, of course, makes them useful beyond words."
—Meloku the Clouded Mirror

name: Nihil Spellbomb
oracle_text:
{T}, Sacrifice Nihil Spellbomb: Exile target player's graveyard.
When Nihil Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {B}. If you do, draw a card.

oracle_text:

name: Pacifism
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

name: Path of Peace
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
flavor_text: As Hedrax stepped into oblivion, he welcomed the unwavering silence.

name: Phantasmal Bear
oracle_text: When Phantasmal Bear becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
flavor_text:
"You know it to be false, but when its claws find you, what you know won't matter much at all."
—Pol Jamaar, illusionist

name: Phyrexian Ghoul
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Phyrexia wastes nothing. Its food chain is a spiraling cycle.

name: Pillage
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"The embers of our homes still smolder, and already the villages of Kjeldor burn in retaliation. What they have started, we will finish."
—Lovisa Coldeyes

name: Plummet
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"Let nothing own the skies but the wind."
—Dejara, Giltwood druid

name: Presence of Gond
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token."
flavor_text: "Here lies Gond, hero of Safehold Taldwen. May he ever guide our quest."

name: Primal Clay
oracle_text: As Primal Clay enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 artifact creature, a 2/2 artifact creature with flying, or a 1/6 Wall artifact creature with defender in addition to its other types. (A creature with defender can't attack.)

name: Pyre Hound
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Pyre Hound.
flavor_text: Its growl is the crackling and popping of a wildfire untamed.

name: Relentless Rats
oracle_text:
Relentless Rats gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield named Relentless Rats.
A deck can have any number of cards named Relentless Rats.

name: Renewed Faith
oracle_text:
You gain 6 life.
Cycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Renewed Faith, you may gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Skepticism fades in the face of the miraculous.

name: Retraction Helix
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gains "{T}: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand."
flavor_text: Where the geometries of the world collapse, a master of the aether can harvest power beyond comprehending.

name: Returned Phalanx
oracle_text:
Defender
{1}{U}: Returned Phalanx can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
flavor_text: They lived in different nations and fought in different eras, but as the Returned, they link arms as one.

name: Ruthless Ripper

Deathtouch
Morph—Reveal a black card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Ruthless Ripper is turned face up, target player loses 2 life.

name: Savannah Lions
flavor_text:
"One alone is fearsome; one among many is unstoppable."
—Benalish proverb

name: Self-Assembler
oracle_text: When Self-Assembler enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Assembly-Worker creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: It sees itself in all of its creations.

name: Shoreline Ranger
oracle_text:
Flying
Islandcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Sift
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.
flavor_text:
"Twice I have let the Legacy slip away. Never again."
—Karn, silver golem

name: Skeletonize
oracle_text: Skeletonize deals 3 damage to target creature. When a creature dealt damage this way dies this turn, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token with "{B}: Regenerate this creature."
flavor_text: Fire burns away both flesh and freedom.

name: Skirk Commando
oracle_text:
Whenever Skirk Commando deals combat damage to a player, you may have it deal 2 damage to target creature that player controls.

name: Soulbright Flamekin

flavor_text: When provoked, a flamekin's inner fire burns far hotter than any giant's forge.

name: Squadron Hawk
oracle_text:
Flying
When Squadron Hawk enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Squadron Hawk, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Supernatural Stamina
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."
flavor_text:
"All are not equal—neither in life nor after death. Bontu's favorites will stand highest in eternity."
—Senifet, vizier of Bontu

name: Thresher Lizard
oracle_text: Thresher Lizard gets +1/+2 as long as you have one or fewer cards in hand.
flavor_text: The sound of its plated tail beating on desert rocks is often mistaken for the footfalls of a much larger predator.

name: Timberpack Wolf
oracle_text: Timberpack Wolf gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control named Timberpack Wolf.
flavor_text:
"The need for the pack is bred in their bones. Their true strength will not show itself for any other purpose."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Totally Lost
oracle_text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text: Fblthp had always hated crowds.

name: Trumpet Blast
oracle_text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Keldon warriors don't need signals to tell them when to attack. They need signals to tell them when to stop.

name: Twisted Abomination
oracle_text:
{B}: Regenerate Twisted Abomination.

name: Uncaged Fury
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor_text:
"It's right to fear those that you keep locked away."
—Rahilda, Vildin-Pack alpha

name: Unearth
oracle_text:
Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: No matter how deep you bury it, some evil refuses to stay dead.

name: Vampire Lacerator
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life unless an opponent has 10 or less life.
flavor_text: The lacerators cut themselves before each hunt. They must feed before the sun rises or bleed to death.

name: Vessel of Nascency
oracle_text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Vessel of Nascency: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, land, or planeswalker card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

name: Whitemane Lion
oracle_text:
Flash
When Whitemane Lion enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Saltfield nomads call a sudden storm a "whitemane."

name: Wildheart Invoker
oracle_text: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Life as we know it dangles on the brink of extinction. We must show the strength they would steal from us."
—*The Invokers' Tales*

name: Woolly Loxodon
oracle_text: Morph {5}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor_text: Even among the hardiest warriors of the Temur, loxodons are respected for their adaptation to the mountain snows.
